item.title: Have you heard about Project Macros?
item.description:
Have you ever been surprised after adding project accounting to Dynamics GP, only to find that users are constantly asked if they want to include project details when entering purchase orders? You might already know that GP support offers macros for both customers and vendors. These tools automatically set default project settings, eliminating the need for manual entry or repetitive prompts. For additional information, please reach out to me at christinap@theknastergroup...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/have-you-heard-about-project-macros/
